title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Introducing the Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen! This handy tool is perfect for easily removing ice and frost from your fridge, making your life easier and your kitchen safer.

Made with high-quality stainless steel and a durable PP handle, this ice scraper is built to last. It comes in three attractive colors: blue, gray, and pink, so you can choose the one that suits your style.

With a size of 17 cm in length and 4.5 cm in width, this ice scraper is compact and easy to handle. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, making it suitable for all your household requirements.

Each package includes one Fridge Ice Scraper, so you'll have everything you need to tackle ice buildup in your refrigerator.

Please note that there may be a slight deviation in measurements, ranging from 1 to 5mm. Additionally, the actual color of the ice scraper may vary slightly due to monitor and lighting effects.

Don't let ice and frost slow you down in the kitchen. Get your Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen today and enjoy a frost-free fridge effortlessly!
